p: Secondary endpoints evaluated were the proportion of patients achieving the collection of ≥2 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg in ≤4 days of apheresis, the number of days of apheresis required to collect ≥5 × 10 6 and ≥2 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg, the daily number of CD34 + cells/kg collected, and the total number of CD34 + cells/kg collected in up to four aphereses.
